channel.title: onsen on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in onsen on Barefoot Rob

item.title: onsen with Robert Golden
item.description: 13:47 Thursday 09 May 2019 JST Robert Golden and I enjoyed chatting at the onsen near Minami-tama station on JR Nambu line. Great to get to know each other better. I told him about how I ended up in Japan, including Tammy, Bonnie, Wende, janette, Lin. We talked about MKP Japan and the work we are doing here. I learned how he ended up in Hawaii. I wished we could hang out longer at the onsen; I did not finish all my lunch and did not finish sitting in all the pools + both saunas.

item.title: hot foot bath
item.description:
We ate ramen then ice cream.
17:03 Saturday 24 December 2016 JST Now we are headed to a hot foot bath, which I guess is 足温 泉足おんせん in Japanese. Oops it’s 足湯うあしゆう Good for me since I’m barefoot, and it’s about 3C outside. 18:02 Saturday 24 December 2016 JST mmmmm that was nice. Also nice to talk to some of the locals. I dropped the anger that usually comes up when people tell me how “good” my Japanese is, and just talked to them the best I could.
